endpoints.description: Retrieve historical stock price data for specified companies over a defined time range. This endpoint supports various filters to refine data output for an analyst's specific needs.
Access real-time stock market prices and updates, enabling instant data retrieval for timely investment decisions.
Submit machine learning models for execution on financial data sets. This allows users to perform predictive analytics using advanced algorithms.
Fetch and modify customizable dashboards where users can visualize and interpret financial data using various tools and visual elements provided by the service.
Subscribe to specific data packages based on the user's requirement. This endpoint also supports API key validation and active subscription tracking.
Generate comprehensive reports based on analyzed financial data. This endpoint aids users in reporting financial performance and insights gleaned from data analysis.
Initiate and process financial transactions securely. Enables integration with banking services for executing trades or other financial operations.
Access the latest financial news and updates affecting capital markets. This endpoint aggregates news pieces to keep users informed about trends and events.
Retrieve current and historical data on major financial indices, helping analysts to evaluate market conditions and derive insights for decision-making.
Configure and manage real-time alerts for specific financial data points, aiding users in maintaining vigilance over key market shifts and opportunities.
